kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Wait for detection
Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'Place the image in the frame')]' still visible after 25 seconds.
kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'Place the image in the frame')]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'Place the image in the frame')]' still visible after 25 seconds.

kw.doc: wait for the augementation to be detected using the visibility of instructions
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'Place the image in the frame')]' still visible after 25 seconds.

kw.msg: ${message} = Element 'xpath=//span[contains(text(), 'Place the image in the frame')]' still visible after 25 seconds.
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Log
kw.msg: ⚠️ Expected behavior: The element is still visible after 25s miss detection.
kw.arg: ⚠️ Expected behavior: The element is still visible after 25s miss detection.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.arg: ⚠️ Expected behavior: The element is still visible after 25s miss detection.
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//button[contains(., 'Click here to upload an image.')]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

test.doc: upload the 2nd image using button and uploading methods, test could fail if you start them inside the /tests/ folder instead of the main folder due to the path management.
